about_the_game:
The Black Dawn DLC adds 3 new romance options into the game:


Vadoma - a mysterious Roma traveller



Petra - a strict head maid



Liliana - a kind-hearted mother-to-be, previously in the game only as a secondary NPC.


Each of them comes with a unique side story that runs parallel to the game's main story, but can occasionally influence it.

On top that, the DLC also adds additional sex scenes for existing love interests as well as other juicy content!
